n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
k=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number:"))
digits=array(0)
j=1
for(i in 1:n){
while(arr[i]!=0){
  digits[j]=arr[i]%%10
  arr[i]=arr[i]%/%10
  j=j+1
}
}
print(sum(digits==k))
